Commands.Stinger Mog: 5-HIT BRV attack that ignores Defense.  Inflicts Fire Resistance Down for 2 turns with a medium probability.  Grants 1 stack of Doll Master for 6 turns (max is 5).
Commands.Fire Moomba: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Low Action Delay.  Grants 1 stack of Doll Master for 6 turns (max is 5).

Passives.Stinger Mog Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Stinger Mog/+.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Fire Moomba Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Fire Moomba/+.
Passives.Stinger Mog Charge: Increases Stinger Mog's max uses by 1.
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack).
Passives.Fire Moomba Charge: Increases Fire Moomba's max uses by 1.
Passives.The Black Mage Doll Master: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while Doll Master is active.
Passives.Doll Master Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while Doll Master is active.
Passives.Stinger Mog Extend: Increases Stinger Mog's max uses by 1.When using Stinger Mog:- Slightly raises its potency.- Triggers an HP attack after use.While Doll Master is active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 4-HIT magic BRV attack with a small potency increase.While Doll Master V is active:- Turns Stinger Mog to Stinger Mog+.- Stinger Mog+ is an AoE with the same properties as Stinger Mog.- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.
Passives.Doll Master Boost All: Moderately raises party's Max BRV while Doll Master is active.
Passives.Fire Moomba Extend: Increases Fire Moomba's max uses by 1.When using Fire Moomba:- Moderately raises its potency.While Doll Master is active:- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+.- HP Attack+ is a 3-HIT magic BRV+HP attack with low Action Delay.While Doll Master V is active:- Turns Fire Moomba to Fire Moomba+.- Fire Moomba+ is an AoE with the same properties as Fire Moomba.- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.

Weapons.Fire Moomba CP: 35: When using Fire Moomba/+:- Raises its potency.- Grants one more Doll Master stack.- Grants Fire Enchant to all party members for 6 turns.- Grants Small Max BRV Up to self for 6 turns.- Grants yet another Doll Master stack when Weak damage is dealt.When using HP Attack/+:- If Doll Master is active, grants 1 additional stack.
Weapons.Magical Mog CP: 15: When using Stinger Mog/+:- Raises its potency.- Raises Fire Resistance Down's success rate and extends its duration.- Grants one more Doll Master stack.- Grants yet another Doll Master stack when Weak damage is dealt.When using BRV Attack/+:- Raises its potency.- If Doll Master is active, grants 1 additional stack.
